patthana21.34:4.1: Nahetuṃ naatītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.34:5.1: Nahetuṃ naanāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.34:6.1: Nahetuṃ napaccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
